title: ITablePatternFeatureData.IGetSkippedItemArray
description: Gets the skipped items in this table-driven pattern feature.
returns: in-process, unmanaged C++: Pointer to an array of skipped items VBA, VB.NET, C#, and C++/CLI: Not supported See In-process Methods for details about this type of method.
remarks:
See
Accessing Selections that Define Features
for additional details.
Call
ITablePatternFeatureData::GetSkippedItemCount
before calling this method to get the size of the array.
Because this is a 0-based array, if you skipped the third feature and fifth feature in the pattern, then:
0 = 3
1 = 5
